title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo in the application, it does not take focus. The only way to achieve focus is by dropping down the combo list. This is a regression introduced in the Photon release.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not receive focus. The focus remains unchanged and does not switch to the Combo.
EB: Upon clicking on the first Combo, the focus caret should be displayed within the Combo and the Combo should be in focus.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
  1. Launch the application. 
  2. Attempt to click on the first Combo. 

Expected result: 
  - The focus caret should appear within the first Combo and it should receive focus upon clicking on it.
